content: this pattern is created by cchhaassssiittyy ooqquueennddoo iiff yyoouu hhaavvee aannyy pprroobblleemmss wwiitthh tthhiiss ppaatttteerrnn pplleeaassee eemmaaiill me at chassityoquendo@aol com foorr mmoorree ppaatttteerrnnss vviissiitt 7polkadots etsy com tttthhhhiiiissss ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiissss ffffoooorrrr nnnnoooonnnnccccoooommmmmmmmeeeerrrrcccciiiiaaaallll uuuusssseeee oooonnnnllllyyyy pppplllleeeeaaaasssseeee ddddoooo nnnnooootttt sssseeeellllllll mmmmyyyy ppppaaaatttttttteeeerrrrnnnn iiiinnnn aaaannnnyyyy wwwwaaaayyyy sssshhhhaaaappppeeee oooorrrr ffffoooorrrrmmmm bbbbuuuutttt yyyyoooouuuu aaaarrrreeee mmmmoooorrrreeee tttthhhhaaaannnn wwwweeeellllccccoooommmmeeee ttttoooo sssseeeellllllll aaaannnnyyyy ffffiiiinnnniiiisssshhhheeeedddd pppprrrroooodddduuuucccctttt yyyyoooouuuu hhhhaaaavvvveeee mmmmaaaaddddeeee tttthhhhaaaannnnkkkk yyyyoooouuuu mmmmaaaatttteeeerrrriiiiaaaallllssss nnnneeeeeeeeddddeeeedddd my doll is made of worsted weight yarn and caron s simply soft but you can use any yarn you choose crochet hook size f for a doll that measures about 8 3/4 inches you can use an e hook for a small doll polyfil 2 -9mm safety eyes embroidery floss or scrap yarn in pink and brown mouth and hair colors yarn needle for sewing on arms and legs and embroidery hhhheeeeaaaadddd with the skin tone color work in the round not joining every round use a stitch marker to mark row round 1 make a magic loop and single_crochet 6 in the loop 6 sts round 2 single_crochet twice in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 single_crochet 1 single_crochet twice in next st around 18 sts round 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet twice in next st around 24 sts round 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet twice in next st around 30 sts round 6 single_crochet 4 single_crochet twice in next st around 36 sts round 7 single_crochet 5 single_crochet twice in next st around 42 sts round 8 single_crochet 6 single_crochet twice in next st around 48 sts round 9-17 single_crochet around note insert safety eye between rounds 12-13 or wherever you choose this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 18 single_crochet 6 decrease around 42 sts round 19 single_crochet 5 decrease around 36 sts round 20 single_crochet 4 decrease around 30 sts round 21 single_crochet 3 decrease around 24 sts round 22 single_crochet 2 decrease around 18 sts stuff head about 2/3 of the way full with polyfil bbbbooooddddyyyy switch to pajama color and continue round 1 single_crochet around 18 sts round 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet twice in next st around 24 sts round 3 single_crochet around round 4 single_crochet 3 single_crochet twice in next st around 30 sts round 5 single_crochet around round 6 single_crochet 4 single_crochet twice in next st around 36 sts round 7-10 single_crochet around round 11 single_crochet 5 single_crochet twice in next st around 42 sts round 12 single_crochet 6 single_crochet twice in next st around 48 sts round 13-15 single_crochet around round 16 single_crochet 6 decrease around 42 sts round 17 single_crochet 5 decrease around 36 sts round 18 single_crochet 4 decrease around 30 sts this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com round 19 single_crochet 3 decrease around 24 sts round 20 single_crochet around
